title: What am I missing here?
selftext: Is this the same product ?  Is 39000 booking amount?
comments: That’s likely a starting price for the range. Try booking at lower storage. That’s definitely not a billing amount. Also, that amount must be after all discounts have been taken account of.
Na. 73000 one is the base one 128 storage, 8GB RAM .And also there won't be discounts worth 34000 no way
I am saying it must be a starting price for the range - so it must be cheaper for lower storage?
On other note, you should ideally get an ipad if you're going to spend that much money. Android's app ecosystem for tablets is shite.
Ya I was gonna compare these two along with OnePlus tab. I'm gonna use them for art purpose so thought a newer tab would be better. 73k is way out of my budget.
